text: A relish is a cooked, chopped, or pickled vegetable or fruit. ==Origin and use== Relish originated in India, and has spread worldwide. Although it is used as an ingredient in many different dishes in India, it is mainly used as a condiment in most other countries. This use has made it one of the world's largest selling condiments. It is mainly used on hot dogs and hamburgers. ==Related pages== *Condiment *Ketchup *Mustard ==References== Category:Condiments Category:Sauces
title: Relish
